DOC.brief_summary: Five high methylglyoxal ( 460-667 mg/kg ) Manuka honey sample select different geographical locale around North Island New Zealand test glycaemic index ( GI ) 10 healthy volunteer single-blinded , randomised study . Participants feed honey contain 25g available carbohydrate 200 ml water blood glucose response measure ( area curve ; AUC ) compare 25 g available carbohydrate glucose .
